channel.title: Cowboy(BD)/Gunner(Unseen)
channel.description:
> **BD - cowboy(unique)** > > *BD killer* > > **If that match have cowboy,then it will have no hunter in that match.** > > *Passive:* > > **Huntsman**:ignore knight guards and occupy when attacking.(keep on class changes) > > **Badge:**The first time cowboy got attacked will have death immune,then lose this perk.Also,lose the perk after converted. > > *Day ability:* > > **Shoot!** - only enable at D5,one use.The player can shoot anyone in the court expect king.if cowboy use this ability,the whole voting section will get canceled and only a animation of arrow shooting will happen.(Can’t use this ability when voted up a person) > > If he shot a bd fellow,tomorrow will have no voting session and cowboy will commit suicide that night. > > *Night ability:* > > **Revolver**:enables in n3,can be used three times.Shoot a player,not only can kill them.if target has death immune,will cause target player to bleed. > > If healer was on target player that day,target player won’t bleed and show two notification for the healer > > (You healed the target) > (Target was bleeding,so you healed him) > > > > It can also shoot king,can let that chronomancer delay and send it to unseen/cult. > > Totally not buffing chrono. > > Also there is a ability call Cowboy’s instinct > Same as hunter’s mark but can use on n1 > > lol
CONVERT TO
> **Unseen - Gunner** > > *Unseen offensive* > > *Passive:* > > **Huntsman**:ignore knight guards and occupy when attacking.**(keep on class changes)** > > *Day ability:* > > **Distraction**:two use,silence target player for twenty second. > > **Aim**:Aim one player. > > When assassin attacked (aimed)target. It will bypass imprison,occupy,redirect and knight guard. > > *Night ability:* > > **Headshot**:One use,can attack a player,and bypass death immune. > > **Beer pressure**:Unlimited use,Make player who target a fellow unseen redirect to shooter’s target.
Oml I come up with two ideas one day... lol

item.title: Cowboy(BD)/Gunner(Unseen)
item.dc:creator: Icibalus
item.description:
dayvig is a flawless role with absolutely no glaring problems with balance in shortday whatsoever, I have no idea what you’re talking about

any accusations of it fucking up any chance of reasonable discussion and taking away all social aspects of the game permanently are entirely unfounded apart from the whole “reality” thing, which dosen’t really matter in social deduction

Read full topic

item.title: Cowboy(BD)/Gunner(Unseen)
item.dc:creator: Lastday3312
item.description:
This is not what day vig.

if unseen have majority,this can be bd’s last chance to win.i even put it d5 so cowboy player won’t shoot randomly.

If he shot a bd fellow,tomorrow will have no voting session and cowboy will commit suicide that night.

If he shot bd randomly there will be one more guy getting banned

um…it’s the same as an amazing hunter that shot an arrow to unseen/cult at the last moment and king is actually bd not evil

Read full topic

item.title: Cowboy(BD)/Gunner(Unseen)
item.dc:creator: Magnus
item.description:
Lastday3312:

Shoot! - only enable at D5,one use.The player can shoot anyone in the court expect king.if cowboy use this ability,the whole voting section will get canceled and only a animation of arrow shooting will happen.(Can’t use this ability when voted up a person)

Dayvig no no.

Read full topic

Badge:The first time cowboy got attacked will have death immune,then lose this perk.Also,lose the perk after converted.

Badge (Passive) - Immune to death at night. You lose this passive after you are first attacked or converted.

One time immunity. Typically BD don’t get immunity.

item.title: Cowboy(BD)/Gunner(Unseen)
item.dc:creator: Lastday3312
item.description:
BD - cowboy(unique)

BD killer

If that match have cowboy,then it will have no hunter in that match.

Passive:

Huntsman:ignore knight guards and occupy when attacking.(keep on class changes)

**Badge:**The first time cowboy got attacked will have death immune,then lose this perk.Also,lose the perk after converted.

Day ability:

Shoot! - only enable at D5,one use.The player can shoot anyone in the court expect king.if cowboy use this ability,the whole voting section will get canceled and only a animation of arrow shooting will happen.(Can’t use this ability when voted up a person)

If he shot a bd fellow,tomorrow will have no voting session and cowboy will commit suicide that night.

Night ability:

Revolver:enables in n3,can be used three times.Shoot a player,not only can kill them.if target has death immune,will cause target player to bleed.

If healer was on target player that day,target player won’t bleed and show two notification for the healer

(You healed the target)
(Target was bleeding,so you healed him)

It can also shoot king,can let that chronomancer delay and send it to unseen/cult.

Totally not buffing chrono.

Also there is a ability call Cowboy’s instinct
Same as hunter’s mark but can use on n1

lol

CONVERT TO

Unseen - Gunner

Unseen offensive

Passive:

Huntsman:ignore knight guards and occupy when attacking.(keep on class changes)

Day ability:

Distraction:two use,silence target player for twenty second.

Aim:Aim one player.

When assassin attacked (aimed)target. It will bypass imprison,occupy,redirect and knight guard.

Night ability:

Headshot:One use,can attack a player,and bypass death immune.

Beer pressure:Unlimited use,Make player who target a fellow unseen redirect to shooter’s target.

Oml I come up with two ideas one day… lol

Read full topic
